alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Garfield; Petroleum (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 04 at 12:56PM MDT until April 06 at 4:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT TUESDAY FOR FORT PECK LAKE... ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 4 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Lake Wind Advisory for Fort Peck Lake, which is in effect until 6 AM MDT Tuesday when the High Wind Warning takes over. * WINDS...West 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * LAKE WIND TIMING...This afternoon through Tuesday morning. * HIGH WIND TIMING...Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds on area lakes will create hazardous conditions with large waves that could swamp or tip for small craft.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage. Boaters should use extreme caution if venturing onto Fort Peck Lake. For your personal safety, avoid the open waters. Stay close to shore or around protected areas.
